item.title: Roadworks taking place ramp issues, 29th July
item.description:
As you are leaving the roadworks (towards Thames water site) there is a massive ramp in which has not been sign posted for in this direction ! Very dangerous! Could cause serious damage to vehicles. They have managed to put a sign in the opposite direction which obviously isn’t facing drivers coming from main direction. Need to put a sign both ways !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bazalgette Way, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
